help-file.title: TRAP
help-file.content:
Syntax: "drop trap" and "hide trap" Area of effect: <room>
"Trap" is a skill possessed by Thieves and specialized Mercenaries or Rangers. These individuals have the ability to "set" traps in a room that when triggered by a mob or a player, will notify the character. Traps must be purchased from Rogue shops found throughout the world.
